title: 4br/2ba ►3D VIRTUAL TOUR ►REMODELED, FULL-FLOOR, FLAT!
posting_body: Please reply by email to this posting.
•Living room and dining area with desirable, open floor plan
•Remodeled granite, eat-in, gas kitchen with dishwasher and disposal
•Custom kitchen cabinets with all stainless appliances
•Two large, remodeled, tiled baths; one bath in the master suite
•Laundry room with washer and dryer inside the unit
•Telephone jacks and cable hookup in every room
This renovated, full-floor flat, with easy street parking, is situated in one of the city's most delightful and diverse neighborhoods; Excelsior/Mission Street.
Mission Street provides a cornucopia of great coffeehouses, bars, restaurants, grocery stores, and shops, all within a few blocks from your new home.
Nearby Balboa Park boasts a soccer field, basketball court, swimming pool, and tennis courts.
A commuter dream; the financial district is approximately fifteen minutes away.
It is a five-minute drive to 280 or 101 freeways for a quick commute to the valley.
The Bart station is within half a mile at Balboa Park Station, and public transportation is everywhere.
Walk Score: 93 - Transit Score: 90 – Bike Score: 76
First month's rent and a security deposit of ONE month's rent.
The lease is for one year.
The move-in date is anytime in August or September 1st.
Thank you for reading this posting.
If you would like to schedule a private viewing, please reply by email to this posting.
